name: Canagold Resources Ltd.
longDescription: Canagold owns a portfolio of Gold and Silver projects located in North America. The company's flagship asset is New Polaris - an advanced and past-producing, high-grade gold project in northern British Columbia, Canada. The company has a fully funded work program underway at New Polaris, and is currently advancing the project to feasibility status. CanaGold is managed by an experienced team with a strong track record of exploration, development and finance.
